project_abstract.cdata: The major objective of the Songliao Plain Agricultural Development Project is to increase agricultural production, farm-family incomes, rural employment and women's participation by increasing the productivity and marketability of crop, fruit, livestock and aquatic products. The project will increase hectarage of productive lands by: (a) expanding irrigation and drainage facilities; (b) developing unutilized wastelands, including introduction of soil and water conservation; and (c) developing intertidal areas for aquaculture production. It will also diversify crop production from corn to rice and wheat, and invest in livestock production and agroprocessing activities to make use of surplus corn and other by-products.

P003593.projectinfo: <![CDATA[<Project><LangCode>ZH</LangCode><ProjectName>松辽平原农业开发项目</ProjectName><ProjectAbstract>本项目的主要目标是通过提高农产品、水果、畜牧和水产品的生产能力和适销性，增加农业生产、农户收入、农村就业和妇女参与机会。为增加农业和水产生产面积，本项目将：（1）扩建灌溉排水设施；（2）开发未利用湿地，包括开展水土保持工作；（3）开发潮间带，用于水产生产。项目也将实现农作物生产多样化，包括玉米、水稻和小麦等多个品种，还将投资发展畜牧生产和农产品加工活动，以便利用多余玉米和其它农副产品。</ProjectAbstract></Project>]]>
